typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	PipelineTriggerTime as string,
	PipelineRunId as string,
	PipelineName as string
}
source(output(
		RecordId as string,
		RecordVersion as binary,
		RecordCreatedDate as timestamp,
		RecordModifiedDate as timestamp,
		RecordIsDeleted as boolean,
		RecordIsDefinitiv as boolean,
		RecordIsPreceda as boolean,
		PipelineRunId as string,
		PipelineSourceFileName as string,
		PipelineTriggerTime as string,
		PayslipNumber as string,
		BaseRate as double,
		DepartmentCode as string,
		EmploymentTypeCode as string,
		EmploymentTypeCodeDesc as string,
		FirstName as string,
		HoursOrADCode as string,
		HoursOrADCodeDesc as string,
		IdNumber as integer,
		Level1Code as string,
		Level2Code as string,
		NumberOfUnits as double,
		PayDate as date,
		PayMethodCode as string,
		PayMethodCodeDesc as string,
		PeriodEndingDate as date,
		PeriodStartDate as date,
		PositionTitle as string,
		ProjectCode as string,
		Rate as double,
		Surname as string,
		Value as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceSqlDraftStagingPreceda
SourceSqlDraftStagingPreceda alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['RecordId','RecordWatermark'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_fileSystem: 'container-adf-nido-prod-eastau-100-1',
	rejectedData_folderPath: (concat("ds_adsl2_stnidoprodeastau100_json/", $PipelineName, "/",
    toString(toTimestamp(left($PipelineTriggerTime, 20), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH-mm-ss'),
    "_PipelineRunId_", $PipelineRunId, "_ErrorOutput")),
	transactionCommit: 'batch',
	reportSuccessOnError: false,
	mapColumn(
		RecordId,
		RecordWatermark = RecordVersion,
		RecordCreatedDate,
		RecordModifiedDate,
		RecordIsDeleted,
		RecordIsDefinitiv,
		RecordIsPreceda,
		PipelineRunId,
		PipelineSourceFileName,
		PipelineTriggerTime,
		PayslipNumber,
		BaseRate,
		DepartmentCode,
		EmploymentTypeCode,
		EmploymentTypeCodeDesc,
		FirstName,
		HoursOrADCode,
		HoursOrADCodeDesc,
		IdNumber,
		Level1Code,
		Level2Code,
		NumberOfUnits,
		PayDate,
		PayMethodCode,
		PayMethodCodeDesc,
		PeriodEndingDate,
		PeriodStartDate,
		PositionTitle,
		ProjectCode,
		Rate,
		Surname,
		Value
	)) ~> SinkSqlDraftPreceda

source(output(
		{OrgPayRun.OrganizationId} as string,
		{OrgPayRun.PayRunId} as string,
		{OrgPayRun.PeriodEndDate} as date,
		{OrgPayRun.PeriodStartDate} as date,
		{OrgPayRun.PipelineRunId} as string,
		{OrgPayRun.PipelineTriggerTime} as string,
		baseRate as double,
		departmentCode as string,
		employeeId as string,
		employmentTypeCode as string,
		employmentTypeCodeDesc as string,
		firstName as string,
		{hoursOrA/DCode} as integer,
		{hoursOrA/DCodeDesc} as string,
		idNumber as integer,
		level1Code as string,
		level2Code as string,
		lineItemId as integer,
		numberOfUnits as double,
		payDate as string,
		payMethodCode as string,
		payMethodCodeDesc as string,
		payslipId as string,
		payslipNumber as string,
		periodEndingDate as string,
		periodStartDate as string,
		positionTitle as string,
		projectCode as string,
		rate as double,
		surname as string,
		value as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceFileName',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> SourceBlobDefinitivPayslips
source(output(
		RecordId as string,
		RecordVersion as binary,
		RecordCreatedDate as timestamp,
		RecordModifiedDate as timestamp,
		RecordIsDeleted as boolean,
		RecordIsDefinitiv as boolean,
		RecordIsPreceda as boolean,
		PipelineRunId as string,
		PipelineSourceFileName as string,
		PipelineTriggerTime as string,
		EmployeeId as string,
		OrganizationId as string,
		PayRunId as string,
		PayslipId as string,
		PayRunPeriodEndDate as date,
		PayRunPeriodStartDate as date,
		PayslipLineItemId as integer,
		PayslipNumber as string,
		BaseRate as double,
		DepartmentCode as string,
		EmploymentTypeCode as string,
		EmploymentTypeCodeDesc as string,
		FirstName as string,
		HoursOrADCode as string,
		HoursOrADCodeDesc as string,
		IdNumber as integer,
		Level1Code as string,
		Level2Code as string,
		NumberOfUnits as double,
		PayDate as date,
		PayMethodCode as string,
		PayMethodCodeDesc as string,
		PeriodEndingDate as date,
		PeriodStartDate as date,
		PositionTitle as string,
		ProjectCode as string,
		Rate as double,
		Surname as string,
		Value as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceSqlDefinitivPayslips
UnionAlterRowCondition alterRow(insertIf(AlterRowCondition=="Insert"),
	updateIf(AlterRowCondition=="Update"),
	deleteIf(AlterRowCondition=="Delete")) ~> AlterRow1
SelectBlobDefinitivPayslips derive(PayDate = toDate(PayDate),
		HoursOrADCode = toString(HoursOrADCode)) ~> CastDateType1
CastDateType1 filter(greater({OrgPayRun.PeriodEndDate}, toDate("2021-10-15", 'yyyy-MM-dd'))) ~> FilterPeriodEndDate
NotExistsInsert derive(AlterRowCondition = "Insert",
		RecordCreatedDate = currentUTC('A.U.S. Eastern Standard Time'),
		RecordIsDeleted = false()) ~> Insert
SelectSqlDefinitivPayslips, FilterPeriodEndDate exists({Sql.DepartmentCode} == DepartmentCode
	&& {Sql.OrganizationId} == {OrgPayRun.OrganizationId}
	&& {Sql.PayRunId} == {OrgPayRun.PayRunId}
	&& {Sql.EmployeeId} == EmployeeId
	&& {Sql.HoursOrADCode} == HoursOrADCode
	&& {Sql.HoursOrADCodeDesc} == HoursOrADCodeDesc
	&& {Sql.Level1Code} == Level1Code
	&& {Sql.Level2Code} == Level2Code
	&& {Sql.PayslipId} == PayslipId
	&& {Sql.PayslipLineItemId} == PayslipLineItemId
	&& {Sql.PositionTitle} == PositionTitle
	&& {Sql.ProjectCode} == ProjectCode
	&& {Sql.Rate} == Rate,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'right')~> NotExistsDelete
NotExistsDelete derive(AlterRowCondition = "Delete",
		RecordModifiedDate = currentUTC('A.U.S. Eastern Standard Time'),
		RecordIsDeleted = true()) ~> Delete
ExistsUpdate derive(AlterRowCondition = "Update",
		RecordModifiedDate = currentUTC('A.U.S. Eastern Standard Time'),
		RecordIsDeleted = false()) ~> Update
Update, Insert, Delete union(byName: true)~> UnionAlterRowCondition
SourceSqlDefinitivPayslips select(mapColumn(
		{Sql.EmployeeId} = EmployeeId,
		{Sql.OrganizationId} = OrganizationId,
		{Sql.PayRunId} = PayRunId,
		{Sql.PayslipId} = PayslipId,
		{Sql.PayslipLineItemId} = PayslipLineItemId,
		{Sql.DepartmentCode} = DepartmentCode,
		{Sql.HoursOrADCode} = HoursOrADCode,
		{Sql.HoursOrADCodeDesc} = HoursOrADCodeDesc,
		{Sql.Level1Code} = Level1Code,
		{Sql.Level2Code} = Level2Code,
		{Sql.PositionTitle} = PositionTitle,
		{Sql.ProjectCode} = ProjectCode,
		{Sql.Rate} = Rate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSqlDefinitivPayslips
SourceBlobDefinitivPayslips select(mapColumn(
		{OrgPayRun.OrganizationId},
		{OrgPayRun.PayRunId},
		{OrgPayRun.PeriodEndDate},
		{OrgPayRun.PeriodStartDate},
		{OrgPayRun.PipelineRunId},
		{OrgPayRun.PipelineTriggerTime},
		BaseRate = baseRate,
		DepartmentCode = departmentCode,
		EmployeeId = employeeId,
		EmploymentTypeCode = employmentTypeCode,
		EmploymentTypeCodeDesc = employmentTypeCodeDesc,
		FirstName = firstName,
		HoursOrADCode = {hoursOrA/DCode},
		HoursOrADCodeDesc = {hoursOrA/DCodeDesc},
		IdNumber = idNumber,
		Level1Code = level1Code,
		Level2Code = level2Code,
		PayslipLineItemId = lineItemId,
		NumberOfUnits = numberOfUnits,
		PayDate = payDate,
		PayMethodCode = payMethodCode,
		PayMethodCodeDesc = payMethodCodeDesc,
		PayslipId = payslipId,
		PayslipNumber = payslipNumber,
		PeriodEndingDate = periodEndingDate,
		PeriodStartDate = periodStartDate,
		PositionTitle = positionTitle,
		ProjectCode = projectCode,
		Rate = rate,
		Surname = surname,
		Value = value,
		SourceFileName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBlobDefinitivPayslips
FilterPeriodEndDate, SelectSqlDefinitivPayslips exists(DepartmentCode == {Sql.DepartmentCode}
	&& EmployeeId == {Sql.EmployeeId}
	&& HoursOrADCode == {Sql.HoursOrADCode}
	&& HoursOrADCodeDesc == {Sql.HoursOrADCodeDesc}
	&& Level1Code == {Sql.Level1Code}
	&& Level2Code == {Sql.Level2Code}
	&& {OrgPayRun.OrganizationId} == {Sql.OrganizationId}
	&& {OrgPayRun.PayRunId} == {Sql.PayRunId}
	&& PayslipId == {Sql.PayslipId}
	&& PayslipLineItemId == {Sql.PayslipLineItemId}
	&& PositionTitle == {Sql.PositionTitle}
	&& ProjectCode == {Sql.ProjectCode}
	&& Rate == {Sql.Rate},
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistsUpdate
FilterPeriodEndDate, SelectSqlDefinitivPayslips exists(DepartmentCode == {Sql.DepartmentCode}
	&& EmployeeId == {Sql.EmployeeId}
	&& HoursOrADCode == {Sql.HoursOrADCode}
	&& HoursOrADCodeDesc == {Sql.HoursOrADCodeDesc}
	&& Level1Code == {Sql.Level1Code}
	&& Level2Code == {Sql.Level2Code}
	&& {OrgPayRun.OrganizationId} == {Sql.OrganizationId}
	&& {OrgPayRun.PayRunId} == {Sql.PayRunId}
	&& PayslipId == {Sql.PayslipId}
	&& PayslipLineItemId == {Sql.PayslipLineItemId}
	&& PositionTitle == {Sql.PositionTitle}
	&& ProjectCode == {Sql.ProjectCode}
	&& Rate == {Sql.Rate},
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NotExistsInsert
UnionAlterRowCondition aggregate(groupBy(AlterRowCondition),
	CountAlterRowCondition = count(AlterRowCondition)) ~> Aggregate1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['DepartmentCode','EmployeeId','HoursOrADCode','HoursOrADCodeDesc','Level1Code','Level2Code','OrganizationId','PayRunId','PayslipId','PayslipLineItemId','PositionTitle','ProjectCode','Rate'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_fileSystem: 'container-adf-nido-prod-eastau-100-1',
	rejectedData_folderPath: ("ds_adls2_stnidoprodeastau100_log"),
	transactionCommit: 'batch',
	reportSuccessOnError: false,
	mapColumn(
		OrganizationId = {OrgPayRun.OrganizationId},
		PayRunId = {OrgPayRun.PayRunId},
		PeriodEndDate = {OrgPayRun.PeriodEndDate},
		PeriodStartDate = {OrgPayRun.PeriodStartDate},
		PipelineRunId = {OrgPayRun.PipelineRunId},
		PipelineTriggerTime = {OrgPayRun.PipelineTriggerTime},
		BaseRate,
		DepartmentCode,
		EmployeeId,
		EmploymentTypeCode,
		EmploymentTypeCodeDesc,
		FirstName,
		HoursOrADCode,
		HoursOrADCodeDesc,
		IdNumber,
		Level1Code,
		Level2Code,
		PayslipLineItemId,
		NumberOfUnits,
		PayDate,
		PayMethodCode,
		PayMethodCodeDesc,
		PayslipId,
		PayslipNumber,
		PeriodEndingDate,
		PeriodStartDate,
		PositionTitle,
		ProjectCode,
		Rate,
		Surname,
		Value,
		SourceFileName,
		AlterRowCondition,
		RecordModifiedDate,
		RecordIsDeleted,
		RecordCreatedDate,
		EmployeeId = {Sql.EmployeeId},
		OrganizationId = {Sql.OrganizationId},
		PayRunId = {Sql.PayRunId},
		PayslipId = {Sql.PayslipId},
		PayslipLineItemId = {Sql.PayslipLineItemId},
		DepartmentCode = {Sql.DepartmentCode},
		HoursOrADCode = {Sql.HoursOrADCode},
		HoursOrADCodeDesc = {Sql.HoursOrADCodeDesc},
		Level1Code = {Sql.Level1Code},
		Level2Code = {Sql.Level2Code},
		PositionTitle = {Sql.PositionTitle},
		ProjectCode = {Sql.ProjectCode},
		Rate = {Sql.Rate}
	)) ~> SinkSqlDefinitivPayslips

source(output(
		RecordId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select RecordId from draft.Preceda_Payslip_2 where RecordIsDefinitiv=1',
	format: 'query') ~> SourceSqlDraftPayslip
Union1 alterRow(insertIf(AlterRowCondition=="Insert"),
	updateIf(AlterRowCondition=="Update"),
	deleteIf(AlterRowCondition=="Delete")) ~> AlterRow1
SourceSqlDefinitivPayslips, SourceSqlDraftPayslip exists(SourceSqlDefinitivPayslips@RecordId == SourceSqlDraftPayslip@RecordId,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistsUpdate
ExistsUpdate derive(AlterRowCondition = "Update") ~> Update
SourceSqlDefinitivPayslips, SourceSqlDraftPayslip exists(SourceSqlDefinitivPayslips@RecordId == SourceSqlDraftPayslip@RecordId,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NotExistsInsert
NotExistsInsert derive(AlterRowCondition = "Insert") ~> Insert
SourceSqlDraftPayslip, SourceSqlDefinitivPayslips exists(SourceSqlDraftPayslip@RecordId == SourceSqlDefinitivPayslips@RecordId,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NotExistsDelete
NotExistsDelete derive(AlterRowCondition = "Delete") ~> Delete
Update, Insert, Delete union(byName: true)~> Union1

parameters{
	PipelineRunId as string,
	PipelineTriggerTime as string,
	PipelineName as string
}
source(output(
		approvalStatus as string,
		centreCostCode as string,
		date as string,
		employee as string,
		employeeId as string,
		{employeeRef.No} as integer,
		employmentType as string,
		end as string,
		leaveApplicationId as string,
		paramOrganizationId as string,
		pipelineRunId as string,
		pipelineTriggerTime as string,
		room as string,
		roomCostCode as string,
		roster as string,
		rosterId as string,
		start as string,
		timesheetId as string,
		totalCost as double,
		totalHours as double,
		varTimesheetDate as date,
		workType as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceFileName',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> SourceBlobDefinitivTimesheets
source(output(
		RecordId as string,
		RecordVersion as binary,
		RecordCreatedDate as timestamp,
		RecordModifiedDate as timestamp,
		RecordIsDefinitiv as boolean,
		RecordIsDeleted as boolean,
		RecordIsPreceda as boolean,
		PipelineRunId as string,
		PipelineSourceFileName as string,
		PipelineTriggerTime as string,
		PipelineTimesheetEndDate as date,
		PipelineTimesheetStartDate as date,
		EmployeeId as string,
		LeaveApplicationId as string,
		OrganizationId as string,
		TimesheetId as string,
		RosterId as string,
		RosterName as string,
		RosterDescription as string,
		RosterPeriodDurationType as string,
		RosterPeriodDurationCustomTypeValue as string,
		RosterIsTwleveHourTime as boolean,
		RosterIsPaid as boolean,
		RosterEndDate as date,
		RosterStartDate as date,
		ApprovalStatus as string,
		CentreCostCode as string,
		Date as date,
		Employee as string,
		EmployeeRefNo as integer,
		EmploymentType as string,
		End as timestamp,
		Room as string,
		RoomCostCode as string,
		Start as timestamp,
		TotalCost as double,
		TotalHours as double,
		WorkType as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceSqlDefinitivTimesheets
source(output(
		ceaseDate as date,
		commencementDate as date,
		costingSettings as string,
		customPeriodDuration as short,
		defaultPeriodDurationType as string,
		description as string,
		isTemplate as boolean,
		name as string,
		notifyEmployeesByDefault as boolean,
		paid as boolean,
		rosterId as string,
		showAsTwelveHourTime as boolean,
		organizationId as string,
		pipelineRunId as string,
		pipelineTriggerTime as string,
		SourceFileName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceSqlOrgRosters
LeftOuterOrgRosters alterRow(insertIf(AlterRowCondition=="Insert"),
	updateIf(AlterRowCondition=="Update"),
	deleteIf(AlterRowCondition=="Delete")) ~> AlterRow1
Select2 derive(Date = toDate(Date),
		End = toTimestamp(concat(toString(PipelineTimesheetStartDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd', 'A.U.S. Eastern Standard Time'), "T", End), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss', 'A.U.S. Eastern Standard Time'),
		Start = toTimestamp(concat(toString(PipelineTimesheetStartDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd', 'A.U.S. Eastern Standard Time'), "T", Start), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss', 'A.U.S. Eastern Standard Time')) ~> CastDateType1
CastDateType1 filter(greater(Date, toDate("2021-10-15", 'yyyy-MM-dd'))) ~> FilterPeriodEndDate
NotExistsInsert derive(AlterRowCondition = "Insert",
		RecordCreatedDate = toTimestamp($PipelineTriggerTime, 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss'),
		RecordIsDeleted = false(),
		FolderPath = concat("ds_adsl2_stnidoprodeastau100_json/", $PipelineName, "/",
    toString(toTimestamp(left($PipelineTriggerTime, 20), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH-mm-ss'),
    "_PipelineRunId_", $PipelineRunId, "_ErrorOutput")) ~> Insert
CastDateType2, FilterPeriodEndDate exists(Select1@EmployeeId == Select2@EmployeeId
	&& Select1@RosterId == Select2@RosterId
	&& Select1@TimesheetId == Select2@TimesheetId
	&& Select1@LeaveApplicationId == Select2@LeaveApplicationId,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'right')~> NotExistsDelete
NotExistsDelete derive(AlterRowCondition = "Delete",
		RecordModifiedDate = toTimestamp($PipelineTriggerTime, 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss'),
		RecordIsDeleted = true()) ~> Delete
ExistsUpdate derive(AlterRowCondition = "Update",
		RecordModifiedDate = toTimestamp($PipelineTriggerTime, 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss'),
		RecordIsDeleted = false(),
		FolderPath = concat("ds_adsl2_stnidoprodeastau100_json/", $PipelineName, "/",
    toString(toTimestamp(left($PipelineTriggerTime, 20), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss')),
    "_PipelineRunId_", $PipelineRunId, "_ErrorOutput")) ~> Update
Update, Insert, Delete union(byName: true)~> UnionAlterRowCondition
Select1 derive(PipelineTriggerTime = fromUTC(toTimestamp($PipelineTriggerTime, 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), 'A.U.S. Eastern Standard Time')) ~> CastDateType2
SourceSqlDefinitivTimesheets select(mapColumn(
		EmployeeId,
		LeaveApplicationId,
		OrganizationId,
		TimesheetId,
		RosterId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
SourceBlobDefinitivTimesheets select(mapColumn(
		ApprovalStatus = approvalStatus,
		CentreCostCode = centreCostCode,
		Date = date,
		Employee = employee,
		EmployeeId = employeeId,
		EmployeeRefNo = {employeeRef.No},
		EmploymentType = employmentType,
		End = end,
		LeaveApplicationId = leaveApplicationId,
		OrganizationId = paramOrganizationId,
		Room = room,
		RoomCostCode = roomCostCode,
		RosterName = roster,
		RosterId = rosterId,
		Start = start,
		TimesheetId = timesheetId,
		TotalCost = totalCost,
		TotalHours = totalHours,
		PipelineTimesheetStartDate = varTimesheetDate,
		WorkType = workType,
		PipelineSourceFileName = SourceFileName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
FilterPeriodEndDate, CastDateType2 exists(Select2@EmployeeId == Select1@EmployeeId
	&& Select2@RosterId == Select1@RosterId
	&& Select2@TimesheetId == Select1@TimesheetId
	&& Select2@LeaveApplicationId == Select1@LeaveApplicationId,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistsUpdate
FilterPeriodEndDate, CastDateType2 exists(Select2@EmployeeId == Select1@EmployeeId
	&& Select2@RosterId == Select1@RosterId
	&& Select2@TimesheetId == Select1@TimesheetId
	&& Select2@LeaveApplicationId == Select1@LeaveApplicationId,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NotExistsInsert
SourceSqlOrgRosters select(mapColumn(
		RosterEndDate = ceaseDate,
		RosterStartDate = commencementDate,
		RosterPeriodDurationTypeCustomValue = customPeriodDuration,
		RosterPeriodDurationType = defaultPeriodDurationType,
		RosterDescription = description,
		RosterName = name,
		RosterIsPaid = paid,
		RosterId = rosterId,
		RosterIsTwelveHourTime = showAsTwelveHourTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSqlOrgRosters
UnionAlterRowCondition, SelectSqlOrgRosters join(upper(UnionAlterRowCondition@RosterId) == upper(SelectSqlOrgRosters@RosterId),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LeftOuterOrgRosters
LeftOuterOrgRosters filter(isNull(RosterStartDate)) ~> Filter1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['EmployeeId','RosterId','TimesheetId','LeaveApplicationId'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_fileSystem: 'container-adf-nido-prod-eastau-100-1',
	rejectedData_folderPath: (concat("ds_adsl2_stnidoprodeastau100_json/", $PipelineName, "/",
    toString(toTimestamp(left($PipelineTriggerTime, 20), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH-mm-ss'),
    "_PipelineRunId_", $PipelineRunId, "_ErrorOutput")),
	transactionCommit: 'batch',
	reportSuccessOnError: false,
	mapColumn(
		ApprovalStatus,
		CentreCostCode,
		Date,
		Employee,
		EmployeeId,
		EmployeeRefNo,
		EmploymentType,
		End,
		LeaveApplicationId,
		OrganizationId,
		Room,
		RoomCostCode,
		RosterName = UnionAlterRowCondition@RosterName,
		RosterId = UnionAlterRowCondition@RosterId,
		Start,
		TimesheetId,
		TotalCost,
		TotalHours,
		PipelineTimesheetStartDate,
		WorkType,
		RecordModifiedDate,
		RecordIsDeleted,
		PipelineTriggerTime,
		RosterStartDate = RosterEndDate,
		RosterEndDate,
		RosterPeriodDurationTypeCustomValue,
		RosterPeriodDurationType,
		RosterDescription,
		RosterName = SelectSqlOrgRosters@RosterName,
		RosterIsPaid,
		RosterId = SelectSqlOrgRosters@RosterId,
		RosterIsTwelveHourTime
	)) ~> SinkSqlDefinitivTimesheets

		OrganizationId,

		HoursOrADCode,

		Level2Code,

		OrganizationId,

		PayslipLineItemId,

		HoursOrADCode,
		HoursOrADCodeDesc,
		Level1Code,
		Level2Code,
		PositionTitle,
		ProjectCode,
		Rate),
	RowNumber = rowNumber()) ~> Window1

	reportSuccessOnError: true) ~> SinkSqlDraftPreceda

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceSqlPrecedaMap
source(output(
		Code as string,
		Description as string,
		{Description Group} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceSqlPreceedaPayCodes
source(output(
		Code as string,
		Description as string,
		DescriptionGroup as string,
		report as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceSqlDefinitivPayCodes
SourceSqlPrecedaPayslip2 filter(RecordIsDefinitiv==true() 
    && PeriodEndingDate > toDate("2021-10-15")) ~> RecordIsDefinitiv
SourceSqlPrecedaPayslip2 filter(RecordIsPreceda==true() 
    && PeriodEndingDate <= toDate("2021-10-15")) ~> RecordIsPreceda
SelectServiceList, SelectPrecedaMap join({ServiceList.Code} == {PrecedaMap.ServiceCode},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerPrecedaMap1
InnerPrecedaMap1, RecordIsPreceda join({PrecedaMap.PreceedaCode} == DepartmentCode,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> RightOuterPrecedaPayslip21
RightOuterPrecedaPayslip21, SelectPrecedaPayCode join(toString(HoursOrADCode) == {PrecedaPayCodes.Code},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LeftOuterPrecedaPayCodes
InnerPrecedaMap1, RecordIsDefinitiv join({PrecedaMap.PreceedaCode} == ProjectCode,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> RightOuterPrecedaPayslip22
RightOuterPrecedaPayslip22, SelectDefinitivPayCode join(HoursOrADCodeDesc == {DefinitivPayCodes.Description},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LeftOuterDefinitivPayCodes
SourceSqlDefinitivPayCodes filter(report==true()) ~> PayCodeIsReport
LeftOuterDefinitivPayCodes, LeftOuterPrecedaPayCodes union(byName: true)~> UnionPrecedaDefinitiv

		{ServiceList.Code} = Code,
		{ServiceList.Owner} = Owner
	),

	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectServiceList

		{DefinitivPayCodes.Code} = Code,
		{DefinitivPayCodes.Description} = Description,
		{DefinitivPayCodes.DescriptionGroup} = DescriptionGroup
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDefinitivPayCode
SourceSqlPreceedaPayCodes select(mapColumn(
		{PrecedaPayCodes.Code} = Code,
		{PrecedaPayCodes.Description} = Description,
		{PrecedaPayCodes.Description Group} = {Description Group}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectPrecedaPayCode
SourceSqlPrecedaMap select(mapColumn(
		{PrecedaMap.PreceedaCode} = PreceedaCode,
		{PrecedaMap.ServiceCode} = ServiceCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectPrecedaMap
UnionPrecedaDefinitiv alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['RecordId','RecordWatermark'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_fileSystem: 'container-adf-nido-prod-eastau-100-1',
	rejectedData_folderPath: (concat("ds_adsl2_stnidoprodeastau100_json/", $PipelineName, "/",
    toString(toTimestamp(left($PipelineTriggerTime, 20), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH-mm-ss'),
    "_PipelineRunId_", $PipelineRunId, "_ErrorOutput")),
	transactionCommit: 'batch',
	reportSuccessOnError: false,
	mapColumn(
		ServiceListCode = {ServiceList.Code},
		ServiceListOwner = {ServiceList.Owner},
		PrecedaMapPreceedaCode = {PrecedaMap.PreceedaCode},
		PrecedaMapServiceCode = {PrecedaMap.ServiceCode},
		RecordId,
		RecordWatermark,
		RecordCreatedDate,
		RecordModifiedDate,
		RecordIsDeleted,
		RecordIsDefinitiv,
		RecordIsPreceda,
		PipelineRunId,
		PipelineSourceFileName,
		PipelineTriggerTime,
		PayslipNumber,
		BaseRate,
		DepartmentCode,
		EmploymentTypeCode,
		EmploymentTypeCodeDesc,
		FirstName,
		HoursOrADCode,
		HoursOrADCodeDesc,
		IdNumber,
		Level1Code,
		Level2Code,
		NumberOfUnits,
		PayDate,
		PayMethodCode,
		PayMethodCodeDesc,
		PeriodEndingDate,
		PeriodStartDate,
		PositionTitle,
		ProjectCode,
		Rate,
		Surname,
		Value,
		DefinitivPayCode = {DefinitivPayCodes.Code},
		DefinitivPayCodeDescription = {DefinitivPayCodes.Description},
		DefinitivPayCodeDescriptionGroup = {DefinitivPayCodes.DescriptionGroup},
		PrecedaPayCode = {PrecedaPayCodes.Code},
		PrecedaPayCodeDescription = {PrecedaPayCodes.Description},
		{PrecedaPayCodeDescription Group} = {PrecedaPayCodes.Description Group}
	)) ~> SinkSqlDraftPayslipReportView

parameters{
	sourceWildcardPathName as string ('ReportingLeaveApplications')
}
source(output(
		addFooterRow as boolean,
		addStatusBar as boolean,
		extraReportData as string[],
		headers as (createDayOfWeekColumn as boolean, customFieldsKeyName as string, dataType as string, defaultPivotAggregation as string, defaultPivotColumnOrder as boolean, defaultPivotRowOrder as short, defaultPivotValueOrder as boolean, defaultSortDirection as string, defaultSortOrder as boolean, disableDefaultAggregation as boolean, falseText as string, fieldName as string, filterDisabled as boolean, hiddenByDefault as boolean, isCustomFields as boolean, isDynamicColumns as boolean, nullDisplayText as string, numericPrecision as string, prependBaseColumnNameToDayOfWeekColumn as boolean, searchDisabled as boolean, sortDisabled as boolean, title as string, trueText as string)[],
		reportData as (approvers as string, dateSubmitted as string, employeeId as string, employeeNumber as integer, firstName as string, gender as string, leaveAppNumDays as short, leaveApplicationId as string, leaveDateEnd as date, leaveDateStart as date, leaveNotes as string, leavePaymentStatus as string, leaveReasonName as string, leaveTypeId as string, leaveTypeName as string, leaveUnitOfMeasure as string, leaveUnits as double, printName as string, status as string, surname as string)[],
		reportVariantTag as string,
		serverTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	wildcardPaths:[($sourceWildcardPathName)]) ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(reportData),
	mapColumn(
		approvers = reportData.approvers,
		dateSubmitted = reportData.dateSubmitted,
		employeeId = reportData.employeeId,
		employeeNumber = reportData.employeeNumber,
		firstName = reportData.firstName,
		gender = reportData.gender,
		leaveAppNumDays = reportData.leaveAppNumDays,
		leaveApplicationId = reportData.leaveApplicationId,
		leaveDateEnd = reportData.leaveDateEnd,
		leaveDateStart = reportData.leaveDateStart,
		leaveNotes = reportData.leaveNotes,
		leavePaymentStatus = reportData.leavePaymentStatus,
		leaveReasonName = reportData.leaveReasonName,
		leaveTypeId = reportData.leaveTypeId,
		leaveTypeName = reportData.leaveTypeName,
		leaveUnitOfMeasure = reportData.leaveUnitOfMeasure,
		leaveUnits = reportData.leaveUnits,
		printName = reportData.printName,
		status = reportData.status,
		surname = reportData.surname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	transactionCommit: 'single',
	reportSuccessOnError: false) ~> sink2
